price: ߒ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߣߐ߬ ߡߊ߬ߞߕߏ߬ߟߌ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߒ ߧߋ߫ ߢߊ ߡߍ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߒ ߞߍ߫ ߡߊ߬ߓߏ߲߬ߧߊ߬ߣߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: bimā ghafara lī rabbī wajaʿalanī mina al-muk'ramīna
